title: Which is NOT method reducing cognitive dissonance

content.question: Which of the following would hinder a person from reducing the dissonance a person might experience after refusing to contribute money for a gift to a coworker?

choices.label: Saying a phrase such as “I am so rude” over and over
Volunteering to buy a gift for another coworker for a different occasion
Repeating the thought that the coworker makes a good salary and does not need a gift
Making a donation to a charity in the coworker’s name

content.answer: Saying a phrase such as “I am so rude” over and over

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
